description:
The 1st Shift Transportation Supervisor will directly manage the daily delivery process in accordance with company policies and procedure to ensure the timely and efficient delivery of products.

Shift Hours: 06:00-16.00

Duties Include, But Are Not Limited To

  • Driving a culture of operational excellence and model compliance within terminal staff
  • Manage nightly operation of the facility and any driver that is on duty
  • Oversee the monitoring process for hours of service daily and enforce Company policy corrective action procedures for non-compliance
  • Monitor, report and manage delivery on-time performance standards as established
  • Provide constant communications of service issues, both outbound and inbound, to appropriate personnel and departments
  • Training and development of drivers and any additional staff that is on duty, while also playing an active role in development and discipline
  • Communicate company objectives across all levels of the facility
  • Oversee the daily reconciliation of all paperwork including BOLs, delivery receipts and any other documents and other administrative duties as required
  • Performs other related duties as assigned
  • 2+ years experience in LTL, distribution/logistics, transportation or operations management
  • Knowledge of computer systems and handheld scanning technology
  • Knowledge of Microsoft programs (excel, word, teams & office)
  • Bachelors degree is preferred but not required
  • Proven track record of managing resources and efficiencies
  • Experience managing CDL-A drivers.
  • Ability to multitask and continually prioritize a changing workload
  • Ability to meet frequent deadlines
  • Strong organizational skills and attention to detail

Our Benefits Package Includes

Paid Holidays

Paid Sick Days

Paid Vacation Days

Competitive Compensation

Retirement 401k Plan

Medical / Prescription Drug / Dental / Vision Plans

Voluntary Life and AD&D Insurance

EEO/AA/M/F/Vet/Disability

Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their race, color, religion, national origin, sex, protected veteran status or disability.
